Content:
Update on those families from California who'd been stuck in Afghanistan. Some clarity here: 
- Families traveled separately, not on an organized trip.
- Most had come to US on SIV.
- Felt urgency to go visit family after COVID travel restrictions eased. https://t.co/GdD1UBjoSQ
